creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: autumn garden scene: birch trees with orange and yellow leaves in foreground; stone pathway to a wooden gate amid green and yellow grass; bushes; and brightly colored red, yellow, orange, and green foliage in far background
inscription: Left: [?????　山月庵] {1954nen saku, Hakone shinsenkyō sangetsuan}; bottom, in grey: [Sangetsu-an, Hakone Museum], in pencil: [Toshi Yoshida]
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Sangetsu-an, Hakone Museum
